name: Crown Computers
overview:
In 1996, Crown Computers opened its doors for business with one goal in mind: To make technology pull its weight or hit the road.

The idea was simple. Base technology solutions on real-world business needs.

Crown built their own business being the Guinea Pig of new technologies – so their customers wouldnâ€™t have to be. Today, their customers still count on them for cutting edge technologies that wonâ€™t bleed them dry.

Some of the services that Crown provides include:

  • Network Support for Small Business
  • Virus Control and Network Security
  • Spam Control
  • Local and Wide Area Networks
  • E-mail Solutions
  • Remote access to your PC
  • Document Management

By taking time to learn your business, they can work together to build the best combination of hardware and software available to deliver a complete, turn-key solution. Then theyâ€™ll train and support your staff until they feel like experts themselves. While some businesses come and go, you can count on Crown to be there. After 10 years, theyâ€™re here to stay.
